select of_id,Of_no,Of_createid,of_custid,of_dateorder,of_accountid,of_coincode,of_appealstatus ,of_status,of_datereceive,of_datemeet,of_custname,of_dateplanclose,of_datefinish,of_flagsuccess,of_flagfinish ,of_noticenew,of_noticeadjust,of_noticemeet,of_noticefinish,of_flagappraisesale,of_flagappraisedesi ,of_noticeappraise,of_custname from Sales_Order where
of_status in (1,2,3)
of_status NOT in (1,2,3)
order by of_id
